alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:54PM CDT until June 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Taneyville, or 12 miles northeast of Forsyth, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sparta, Oldfield, Garrison, Keltner and Chadwick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
